text: The Kyrgyzstan League (Kyrgyz: Кыргызстан футбол чемпиондугу) is a football league which is top division in Kyrgyzstan. The league has games every year. The current champions are Alay from Osh. The team with the most titles is Dordoi Bishkek from Bishkek. == Clubs 2018 == *Abdysh-Ata Kant *Akademija Osh *Alay *Alga Bishkek *Dordoi Bishkek *Ilbirs Bishkek *Khimik Kara-Balta *Neftchi
